articles.title: Berberine derivative C51 modulates cGAS-STING-TIM-3 axis to reverse immune evasion and inhibit lung cancer growth.
articles.summary: A novel berberine derivative, C51, inhibits lung cancer growth by activating a molecular pathway that reduces immune evasion and suppresses cancer cell proliferation.

articles.title: Investigation of exercise-mimetic bioactive molecules as modulators of MMP activity and expression in cancer cells.
articles.summary: Exercise-mimetic molecules like Icariin and Berberine can inhibit matrix metalloproteinases, potentially reducing lung cancer cell growth and metastasis.
